name: Alchemist Laboratory
description: A workshop dedicated to alchemical research contains dangerous experiments and valuable potions. The valuable knowledge and products attract scholars and merchants, while the unstable experiments and toxic materials create constant danger.
atmosphere: Complex glassware bubbles with colorful solutions while distillation apparatus produces mysterious substances. The air carries acrid chemical scents and rare herbs as dangerous experiments proceed. Shelves lined with reagents and reference books support the alchemical research. Explosive reactions possible at any moment.
